data.name: Railway Reservation System
data.description: Full-stack railway booking system using PHP, MySQL, Tailwind CSS. Features login, ticket booking, and session management.

data.name: Banking System CLI App
data.description: Java-based terminal banking app implementing account creation, deposit, withdrawal, and transaction logging.

data.name: Text Formatter Application
data.description: App designed in Java runs on cli to teach basic programming Which formats your provided data in desired format of Uppercase/Lowercase.

data.name: University Network Design
data.description: Cisco Packet Tracer design including VLANs, printers, FTP server, and wireless. Includes addressing schemes and routing setup.

data.name: React Native Real Estate App for Property Buying, Selling, and Renting
data.description: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native that enables users to buy, sell, and rent residential or commercial properties. The app features property listings, search and  user authentication between buyers and sellers.
